summary: Add a unique female follower to the game base of fighting game Street Fighter.
descriptionHtml:
[center][font=Comic Sans MS][size=3]Chun Li Follower CBBE

[/size][/font][font=Comic Sans MS][size=3]Add a unique female follower to the game base of fighting game Street Fighter.

Name: Chun Li
Class: Unarmed
Level Base: Lv20
Body Type: CBBE HDT
Skill: Heavy Armor
Extra: marriageable

Location:
Solitude Winking Skeever

Required :
Skyrim.esm
HDT

[b][u]> > Required for HDT < <[/u][/b]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/26800/?]XP32 Maximum Skeleton -XPMS by [b]xp32[/b][/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/53996/?]HDT Physics Extensions by [b]HydrogensaysHDT[/b][/url]

[b]Installation : [/b]
NMM or copy to data folder

[b]Uninstall : [/b]
Remove from NMM or Delete from data folder

[b]Recommended : [/b]
